onlyOnePlayer: Only one player can be used as argument
ownerTransferFail: Only the owner may transfer claims
ownerTransferNoBlocks: The new owner doesnt have enough claimblocks
ownerTransferNoBlocksAdmin: You can ignore this by switching to admin mode
claimCreationFailCommand: Couldn't create claim at this position
noPermission: You don't have the required permissions to do that here!
noPermissionSimple: Sorry you can't do that here!
noPermissionTooClose: Sorry you are too close to a claim to do that here!
tooCloseClaim: You are too close to a protected area to do that!
minClaimSize: This is too small. Minimum claimsize is %d
landClaimDisabledWorld: Claiming is disabled in this world
wrongMode: Wrong claim mode. You are in %1$s-mode
stringScreenReturn: Click on paper to go back
claimCooldown: You need to wait %s ticks before creating another claim
uuidFakeAdd: Added fakeplayer with uuid %1$s to the claim
uuidFakeRemove: Removed fakeplayer with uuid %1$s from the claim
uuidFakeModifyNo: Fakeplayer with given uuid is already added
playerModify: Modified permission group for following players to %1$s: %2$s
playerModifyNo: Couldn't set permission group for the players. Probably cause they already belong to a group
playerGroupAddFail: Couldn't add that player to the group either cause the player is already in a group or no player matching the name was found
deleteAllClaimConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all claims? Type it again to confirm
deleteClaimError: You can't delete this claim here
deleteSubClaimError: There is no subclaim here. Switch your claim mode to delete the main claim.
deleteSubClaimAll: All Subclaims from this claim deleted
editPersonalGroup: Default permission %1$s for group %2$s now set to %3$s
nonGlobalOnly: Cannot edit %1$s here since its a global permission
adminDeleteAll: Deleted all claims for following players: %1$s
readConflict: %1$s conflicts with existing claims. Not added to world! Conflicts:
fakePlayerNotification1: A fakeplayer tried to interact with your claim at %1$s in %2$s.
fakePlayerNotification2: Click %s while standing in your claim to add the fakeplayer to the claim.
screenTextJson: Right-Click to use JSON text. See MC Wiki for that.
trappedFail: Rescue not necessary or already rescuing
unlockDropsCmd: Your deathitems are protected. Use %1$s to unlock them for other players
unlockDrops: Your deathitems are now unlocked for %1$s ticks
claimNameUsed: The owner of the claim already has another claim with the same name
claimNameUsedSub: One of the subclaim of this claim already has this name
teleportNoClaim: No such claim to teleport to
teleportHome: Teleporting to claim home. Don't move for 5 seconds
addIgnoreEntry: Added %1$s to the claims ignore list %2$s
removeIgnoreEntry: Removed %1$s from the claims ignore list %2$s
wiki: For more info check out the wiki:
flan:edit_claim.desc: Gives permission to edit (resize, delete...) the claim
flan:edit_perms.desc: Gives permission to change the claims permissions
flan:edit_potions.desc: Gives permission to edit the claims potion effect
flan:break.desc: Permission to break blocks in the claim
flan:place.desc: Permission to place blocks in the claim
flan:interact_block.desc: Gets used for all blocks OPENCONTAINER doesn't check for
flan:interact_sign.desc: Permission to edit signs (e.g. dyeing them)
flan:button_lever.desc: Permission to trigger levers and buttons
flan:itemframe_rotate.desc: Permission to rotate items in item frames
flan:lectern_take.desc: Permission to change books in a lectern
flan:projectiles.desc: interact with blocks (e.g. arrow on button)
flan:raid.desc: Permission to trigger raids in claim.
flan:bucket.desc: Permission to take liquids with buckets
flan:xp.desc: Permission to pick up xp orbs
flan:armorstand.desc: Permission to interact with armor stands
flan:break_non_living.desc: Permission to break things like minecarts or armor stands
flan:can_stay.desc: Allow players to enter your claim
flan:teleport.desc: Allow player to teleport to your claim home position
flan:claim_message.desc: Permission to edit the enter/leave message
flan:archeology.desc: Allow players to brush blocks in this claim
flan:wither.desc: Toggle wither breaking blocks in claim
flan:enderman.desc: Allow enderman picking and placing blocks
flan:piston_border.desc: Toggle piston pull/push across claim borders
flan:lock_items.desc: If items should be locked on death
flan:fake_player.desc: Allow fakeplayers to interact in this claim
Some mods fakeplayer has the users uuid
For those mods this permission is not needed
flan:player_mob_spawn.desc: Permission for affected players to spawn mobs with interactions
E.g. wardens, or endermites with enderpearls
flan:create_contraption.desc: Gives permission to allow minecart contraptions to pass through claim border.
Note if this is disabled and your contraption goes out of the claim it can't go back in!
command.help: Shows all available commands or info for the given command.
command.menu: When standing in a claim you have permissions for opens the claim menu.
command.claimInfo: Prints infos about the claim you're standing in.
command.deleteAll: Deletes all your claims (you need to double type to confirm it so no accidents).
command.deleteAllSubClaims: Deletes all subclaim of the current claim.
command.list: Lists all claims you have. If op also gives ability to list other players claims.
command.switchMode: Switch between normal and subclaim mode.
command.group: - Adds/removes the group with that name. Also editable via the claim menu.
- Adds/remove a player to the group. If overwrite then will overwrite the players current group else does nothing. Also editable via the claim menu.
command.transferClaim: Gives ownership of the claim to the specified player. Only works if you're the claim owner.
command.addClaim: addClaim (<x y z> <x y z>) | all | (rect x z)
Creates a claim with the given positions. Same as using the claim tool.
<all> uses up all remaining blocks for a squared claim centered around the player
<rect> creates a rectangular claim centered around the player
command.permission: Sets global/group/personal permissions. Also editable via the claim menu (for group perm right click on the group in the menu).
command.personalGroups: Opens the gui to edit personal groups.
command.sellBlocks: Sells <amount> claimblocks. Needs gunpowder currency installed.
command.buyBlocks: Buys <amount> claimblocks. Needs gunpowder currency installed.
command.trapped: If in a claim not owned by the player attempts to teleport the player out of it after 5 seconds.
command.unlockDrops: Unlocks dropped items from death so other players can pick them up too. Or all of the given players (needs OP)
command.setHome: Standing in a claim with sufficient permission sets that claims home to the players position
command.teleport: Teleport to the given claims home position. Use admin to teleport to admin claims
command.name: name self <name>
Sets the current claims name
command.claimMessage: Sets the claims message. Use "$empty" to remove the message
command.ignoreList: Adds/Removes an entry to the claim specific ignore list
command.adminMode: Switches to admin mode ignoring all claims.
command.readGriefPrevention: Parses data from the GriefPrevention plugin to Flan
command.setAdminClaim: Sets a claim to an admin claim.
command.listAdminClaims: Lists all admin claims in the current world.
command.adminDelete: Force deletes the current claim or deletes all claims from the specified player.
command.giveClaimBlocks: Gives a player additional claim blocks.
